items.title: Zimmer has surgery, to be back in 6-8 weeks
items.summary: Bradley Zimmer underwent surgery on his left hand (fractured fourth metacarpal) on Tuesday morning at the New York Hand and Wrist Center of Lenox Hill in Manhattan. Dr. Thomas Graham, who examined Zimmer on Monday, performed the operation, which required a plate and nine screws to fixate the fracture.
items.content: Bradley Zimmer underwent surgery on his left hand (fractured fourth metacarpal) on Tuesday morning at the New York Hand and Wrist Center of Lenox Hill in Manhattan. Dr. Thomas Graham, who examined Zimmer on Monday, performed the operation, which required a plate and nine screws to fixate the fracture.

alternate.title: Zimmer has surgery, to be back in 6-8 weeks

items.title: What to expect from Rangers' Calhoun in big leagues
items.summary: Even baseball's fourth-highest scoring offense can use reinforcements. With Carlos Gomez on the disabled list and Adrian Beltre, Robinson Chirinos, Nomar Mazara, Mike Napoli and Rougned Odor all ailing, the Rangers have called up Willie Calhoun to bolster their lineup as they stand two games out of the American League's final wild-card berth.
items.content: <p>Even baseball's fourth-highest scoring offense can use reinforcements. With Carlos Gomez on the disabled list and Adrian Beltre, Robinson Chirinos, Nomar Mazara, Mike Napoli and Rougned Odor all ailing, the Rangers have called up Willie Calhoun to bolster their lineup as they stand two games out of the American League's final wild-card berth.

alternate.title: What to expect from Rangers' Calhoun in big leagues

items.title: Bird has MRI, expects to return Wednesday
items.summary: Greg Bird had a precautionary MRI on his tight lower back on Tuesday morning, and he expects to return to the lineup on Wednesday, when the Yankees will play the finale of their relocated three-game series against the Rays at Citi Field.
items.content: Greg Bird had a precautionary MRI on his tight lower back on Tuesday morning, and he expects to return to the lineup on Wednesday, when the Yankees will play the finale of their relocated three-game series against the Rays at Citi Field.

alternate.title: Bird has MRI, expects to return Wednesday
